channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15743] Add Transparent Data Encryption support for FanOutOneBlockAsyncDFSOutput
item.summary: Add Transparent Data Encryption support for FanOutOneBlockAsyncDFSOutput

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Initial patch that implement the feature.

Will work on making it compatible with earlier HDFS versions.

-1 overall

stack What do you think of the newest patch? It adds the support for hdfs 2.4.x and 2.5.x. I have upload it to review board.

Ted Yu Is this what you want? In the UT, I create a encryption zone directory and write a file under it and then read it using the original InputStream provided by DistributedFileSystem.

Thanks.

Gone through the patch which looks fine to me.

nit: consider making TestSaslFanOutOneBlockAsyncDFSOutput large test - it took 114 seconds on Jenkins.

nit: consider making TestSaslFanOutOneBlockAsyncDFSOutput large test - it took 114 seconds on Jenkins.

Oh yes, it has 36 tests now...
Yes. +1. Skimmed. It looks like it was a load of work.
Pushed to master. Thanks all for reviewing.

FAILURE: Integrated in HBase-Trunk_matrix #897 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-Trunk_matrix/897/)

customfieldvalues.customfieldvalue: Now the AsyncFSWAL can write data to a encryption zone on HDFS.
